## 释义

[口琴（小型吹奏乐器）_百度百科]( http://baike.baidu.com/link?url=krMUWxaLSJ2_edf8ZxvrUW4k1gZmUbTqllAP_eMN8WHUeusdfb9WXReXZPpdIbvIuubPdmy8yNskHNJ7Hec9BXIaRlLHtpscwlbWv4J4iP3 "口琴（小型吹奏乐器）_百度百科" ">>")

* 半音阶口琴 - Chromatic Harmonica

![半音阶口琴](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

* 复音口琴 - Tremolo Harmonica

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

* 全音阶口琴 - Diatonic Harmonica

也被称为 十孔口琴(10-Holes Harp)或布鲁斯口琴，蓝调口琴。

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
